Function entity_db_button_ui

Source 
pub fn entity_db_button_ui(
    ctx: &ViewerContext<'_>,
    ui: &mut Ui,
    entity_db: &EntityDb,
    ui_layout: UiLayout,
    include_app_id: bool,
)
Expand description

Show button for a store (recording or blueprint).

You can set include_app_id to hide the App Id, but usually you want to show it.

This uses list_item::ListItem::show_hierarchical, meaning it comes with built-in indentation.
